attributes.action: to create a governing body that looks in to bad employers in the private Sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to create a governing body that looks in to bad employers in the private Sector. that don't pay fair, give a minimum sick pay like public companies. that ask you take there points when they are caught 
speeding and generally give very poor working
conditions and also treat family differently to other workers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
